Class ParkingSlot

java.lang.Object
ParkingSlot
public class ParkingSlot extends Object
Main GUI Application for the Swinburne Car Park System.

This class handles all GUI-related operations, event handling, and connects the backend CarPark model with user interactions through a friendly, color-coded, and informative interface.

Features:

  • Add/Remove Parking Slots
  • Park/Remove Cars with validation (car can only be in one slot)
  • Find car, show slot info, duration, and owner
  • Show slots visually in a table/grid, with staff/visitor/occupied coloring
  • All I/O uses GUI components only; no console interaction
  • Proper use of Layout Managers for responsive design

Version:
1.0
Author:
Your Name
